    • Reproducible Example

    cmcR

    The cmcR package provides an open-source implementation of the Congruent Matching Cells method for cartridge case identification as proposed by Song (2013) as well as an “improved” version of the method proposed by Tong et al. (2015).

    Installation

    Install the development version from GitHub with:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jzemmels/cmcR")

    Cartridge case scan data can be accessed at the NIST Ballisitics and Toolmarks Research Database
